entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
